movie_title: The Most Awkward “Undercover Boss” Ever - Key & Peele
introduction: This episode of “Undercover Boss” gets awkward when a man finds out the new employee he’s been bully

quiz.question: What was the big reveal Don made to his employees in the warehouse?
choices: a) He was actually a new employee
b) He was the president of the company
c) He was a contestant on a TV show
quiz.answer: b) He was the president of the company
quiz.explanation: Don revealed that he was the president of the company, not a new employee as he had pretended to be.

quiz.question: What unexpected gifts did Don offer to his employees?
choices: a) New cars and college funds
c) Cash bonuses and health insurance
quiz.answer: a) New cars and college funds
quiz.explanation: Don offered a new Ford Explorer to one employee whose car had broken down, and he started college funds for another employee's children with $10,000 for each.

quiz.question: What inappropriate and absurd stories did Joseph tell in response to Don's gifts?
choices: a) Stories about his family tragedies
b) Stories about his body parts
c) Stories about his past as a prostitute
quiz.answer: b) Stories about his body parts
quiz.explanation: Joseph made wildly inappropriate and absurd claims about his body, including his chopped-up dick, in an attempt to get a raise from Don.
